name: StatPress Dashboard Widget Lite
author: Andreas Kaul & H.-Peter Pfeufer

sections.description:
Real time stats from StatPress for your WordPress Dashboard – Lite-Version – much smaller and faster. Based on the original StatPress Widget by Daniele Lippi.

Features

  • much smaller and faster – only the key facts
  • no slowing, design-burning graph
  • fits also on 3-column view
  • just install and place the widget on your dashboard
sections.installation:
You can use the built in installer and upgrader, or you can install the plugin manually.

Installation via WordPress

  1. Go to the menu ‘Plugins’ -> ‘Install’ and search for ‘StatPress Dashboard Widget Lite’
  2. Click ‘install’

Manual Installation

  1. Upload folder ‘statpress-dashboard-widget-lite’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq: Questions? Comments? Just leave them in the comments under http://blog.dunkelwesen.de/download-statpress-dashboard-widget-lite/
